GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.10.140
GSD.description:
net: Fix data-races around sysctl_fb_tunnels_only_for_init_net.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.140 by commit 371a3bcf3144584c511f80e87d4c28ac2c75e9a7, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 79134e6ce2c9d1a00eab4d98cb48f975dd2474cb. For more details please see the references link.
